Aug. 26, 1882 D Lincoln Contest
Lincoln Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
lincoln-contest
None
Lincoln Arboretum, Lincoln, Lincolnshire, England, UK Brass Band News September 1882 shows Britannia Iron Works in 3rd place. Correction in October issue gives result as shown above. Prizes: £25, £15, £10 Fete for the Lincoln district of the Manchester Unity of Oddfellows 8 bands entered, 6 competed
